text: 15.8: 1 Sto 28.9; FG 1.24; 2.4; 10.44; 11.15Nde khueŋ kaŋgiri, Fhe Bakɨme ana za kha gumgi gu mbigi ndavi vheri kaŋgiap, ana won Ŋina Ŋaarar mbe ndɨɨi. Ana won Ŋina Ŋaarar nza nɨɨŋgi tɨvara muuŋgiap, ana mbe nɨɨŋgi. Ana khuen nza khɨvav mba tɨvar mbe muuŋgi. Ana ndava vhee mbe ndirgeŋ nzuav ndikndigi.
